draws the expanded LSystem string to the screen

Parameters:
finalPath - expanded LSYstem string
angle - angle the cursor will rotate for "+,=" symbols

expandPath

public java.lang.String expandPath(java.lang.String init,
                                   java.lang.String grammar,
                                   int depth)
expands an Lsystem grammar

Parameters:
init - The initial string for the LSystem
grammar - The string containing the rules for the LSystem of format: =\n
depth - number of times the LSystem should recurse
Returns:
the expanded string
